title: Aarya Kundan Jhumka Earrings with Emerald Center
features: Exquisite Kundan setting meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. Features an emerald centerpiece surrounded by Polki diamonds in a floral design with delicate gold filigree work. The 'Jhumka' shape adds a touch of traditional charm, perfect for blending heritage with modern sensibilities. Intricate leafy vines crafted in gold emanate from the center stone, lending a touch of nature to the design.
colors: White (Polki Diamonds). The combination of gold and emerald is a classic South Indian pairing.
occasions: and other special occasions. These earrings can elevate both traditional silk sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: These earrings are a testament to the timeless beauty of Kundan craftsmanship. The natural emerald centerpiece adds a touch of regal elegance. Crafted with high-quality materials and expert artistry, these earrings are a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. They embody both cultural significance and aesthetic appeal, making them a perfect heirloom piece. Each earring is a statement of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
